element:
http://www.xulplanet.com/reference/elemref/ref_xblresources.html Used to specify a list of resources that the binding uses. This includes images, using the xbl element or style sheets using the xbl element. The resources element should be placed directly inside the xbl element.
A unique identifier so that you can identify the resources with. You can use this as a parameter to getElementById and other DOM functions and to reference the element in style sheets.
